> <OLD>
>
> Rattrap observes the happenings, and ponders them.  He could see some sort
> of pattern happening.
>
> "Hmmm, whatever it is, it's feedn' off of aggression and anger.  The Cons
> and Preds got plenty of that.  Notice how it didn't take any of us yet?
> It's like I dunno, but it's like it knows how we operate and what makes us
> tick.  I could be wrong, but that's what it feels like.."
>
> Quickstride nods.
>
> " You're right, it hasn't taken any of us Maximals yet.  It's like it knows
> something.  Chaos..  It could be feeding off of chaos, and that's one thing
> we don't have here.  Among us anyway.  Guys, I think Rattrap's onto
> something, if we keep our composure as we are, and our commitment to
> cooperation, whatever grabbed them won't grab us. "
>
> Rattrap looks to everyone.
>
> " We gotta keep our cool, even if  it is gonna be difficult.."
>
> He looks over to Skyshadow and Cryotek.
>
> " If you guys wanna avoid what happened ta your boss, ya better keep it
> tagether.  Just a little hint of advice."

<NEW>

CRYOTEK and SKYSHADOW continue to watch each other for a long moment
none of them moving, thier optics bright and their weapons steady.

"You know I know more about what's going on here than you." CRYOTEK
said as watched SKYSHADOW warily. "If we're going to get out of here
we need knowledge as much as firepower."

"Fine!" SKYSHADOW said, "You want to run the show, then run it." His
words were dark and deep. "But will revisit this later, just you
wait."

CRYOTEK nodded although for a long moment neither of them dropped
their weapons. Then finally they both lowered them and for a moment it
seemed as if the Predacons breathed a sigh of relief.

Looking over at RAT TRAP and QUICKSTRIDE, "Is that why you think that
Hydras was taken, in addition to Cyclonus and Scourge?" He raised an
optic ridge. "There is another commonality that you have not yet
considered."

LEO PRIME nodded as he was catching on to it.

"What! What?" BANTOR said looking around as if he was the only one who
didn't catch it.

SANTON leaned in, "All of them were have some of Unicron built into
them. Even Hydras is built from Galvatron Unicron's former herald."

With a surprised expression BANTOR nodded.

"Well we have lost our guide." LEO PRIME said looking down at the
destroyed tracker. "so they couldn't all have been holograms either."

NOCTORRO looked at LEO PRIME, "Now which way?"

TERRORGATOR pointed, "There?" he said as he pointed at the caves.

There was a grunt from BANTOR, "Yeah, but how do we know where it goes."

LEO PRIME walked towards the caves. "We don't, but I would think this
is the same place Tuscon was taken."


Meanwhile unknown to most some of the PREDACONS had taken it upon
themselves to make other plans . . .

>
> For the moment, up in the trees, BLACKARACHNIA had managed to try and plant
> a powerful homing beacon tracking the IFF of Hydras 'before' his capture,
> which each PREDACON had been planted with.
>
> Hopefully being able to use it to track HYDRAS even through the heavy
> jamming in the area.

<NEW>

If these new beacons that BLACKARACHNIA was trying to plant were the
equivalent of digital bugle in power outputs, what she was getting
back was like 'triangles'. It was heavily muted and only good for
short range, perhaps 40 or 50 meters. Actually better than what they
were getting before, which was virtually nothing past 10 meters.

However having said that there was still no trace of HYDRAS. If he was
still alive, he was out of sensor range.

> <OLD>
>
> For the moment, wtih transponders only working at close range, DINOBOT had
> vanished along with DRILL BIT into the tunnels in all of the chaos, probably
> unnoticed, wtih BLACKARACHNIA hiopefully being able to at short range at
> least give them a heading through the comm jamming to track the tracer
> beacon upon HYDRAS, if possible.
>
> With WASPINATOR up in teh air hopefully assisting with providing
> triangulation, with luck they mnight have a rough heading to break off and
> begin tracking thier 'leader' even as SKY SHADOW and CRYOTEK put on a show.

The tunnels appear to be going down, the ground sloping down almost
sharply in spots. The tunnel walls are made completely of stone and
rock and, at least at this point, look natural. There was still no
trace of HYDRAS as they went down. However the interesting thing was
that the lower they went the shorter their transponder signal became.
Whatever it was they were going into, the interference on their
com-links and transponders was getting stronger.

>
